patterns: Atal Pension Yojana
Pension
Is there any schemes related to Pension

Social Sector Scheme in relation to the Pension Sector.Mission is to create a universal social security system for all Indians, especially the poor, the under-privileged and the workers in the unorganised sector. APY is administered by Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA).

responses: Atal Pension Yojana. Social Sector Scheme in relation to the Pension Sector.Mission is to create a universal social security system for all Indians, especially the poor, the under-privileged and the workers in the unorganised sector. APY is administered by Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA).

patterns: Central Government Health Scheme
Health
Is there any schemes related to Health

Complete medical care facilities to Government employees (Central) and their family members.The Central Government Health Scheme (CHGS) provides healthcare to the employees and pensioners of the Central Government that are enrolled under this scheme. It covers health care under different systems of medicine, ranging from allopathy and homeopathy to Ayurveda, Unani, Siddha, and Yoga.

responses: Central Government Health Scheme. Complete medical care facilities to Government employees (Central) and their family members.The Central Government Health Scheme (CHGS) provides healthcare to the employees and pensioners of the Central Government that are enrolled under this scheme. It covers health care under different systems of medicine, ranging from allopathy and homeopathy to Ayurveda, Unani, Siddha, and Yoga.

patterns: Deendayal Disabled Rehabilitation Scheme
Social Justice
Is there any schemes related to Social Justice

Welfare schemes in India:- Decreasing disparity related to opportunities, equity, social justice and empowerment of persons with disabilities.The approach of this Scheme is to provide financial assistance to voluntary organizations to make available the whole
range of services necessary for rehabilitation of persons with disabilities including early intervention, development of
daily living skills, education, skill-development oriented towards employability, training and awareness generation.

responses:
Deendayal Disabled Rehabilitation Scheme. Welfare schemes in India:- Decreasing disparity related to opportunities, equity, social justice and empowerment of persons with disabilities.The approach of this Scheme is to provide financial assistance to voluntary organizations to make available the whole
range of services necessary for rehabilitation of persons with disabilities including early intervention, development of
daily living skills, education, skill-development oriented towards employability, training and awareness generation.

intents.tag: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana
patterns: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana
Rural Power Supply
Is there any schemes related to Rural Power Supply

Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana (DDUGJY) is designed to provide continuous power supply to the entire rural India. The scheme was launched under leadership of Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi in November 2014 announcing that "the government had decided to electrify 18,452 unelectrified villages within 1000 days, by May 1, 2018.
I want to know about Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana
can you tell me about Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana
what is Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana
responses: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana. Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana (DDUGJY) is designed to provide continuous power supply to the entire rural India. The scheme was launched under leadership of Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi in November 2014 announcing that "the government had decided to electrify 18,452 unelectrified villages within 1000 days, by May 1, 2018.

patterns: Digital India Programme
Digitally Empowered Nation
Is there any schemes related to Digitally Empowered Nation

The main objective is to ensure that government services are available to citizens electronically and people get benefited from all the latest technology.Mission is to ensure the Government's services are made available to citizens electronically by improved online infrastructure and by increasing Internet connectivity or making the country digitally empowered in the field of technology. The initiative includes plans to connect rural areas with high-speed internet networks.

The main objective is to ensure that government services are available to citizens electronically and people get benefited from all the latest technology.Mission is to ensure the Government's services are made available to citizens electronically by improved online infrastructure and by increasing Internet connectivity or making the country digitally empowered in the field of technology. The initiative includes plans to connect rural areas with high-speed internet networks.

patterns: Indira Gandhi Matritva Sahyog Yojana
Mother Care
Is there any schemes related to Mother Care

It is another central government scheme for An incentive of Rs. 4000 to women (19 years and above) for the first two births.It is a conditional cash transfer scheme for pregnant and lactating women of 19 years of age or above for the first live birth.It provides a partial wage compensation to women for wage-loss during childbirth and childcare and to provide conditions for safe delivery and good nutrition and feeding practices.

patterns: Jawaharlal Nehru National Urban Renewal Mission (JnNURM)
Urban Development[7]

A programme dedicated to improving the quality of life and infrastructure in the cities.The aim is to encourage reforms and fast track planned development of identified cities. Focus is to be on efficiency in urban infrastructure and service delivery mechanisms, community participation, and accountability of ULBs/ Parastatal agencies towards citizens.

patterns: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana
Rural Development
Is there any schemes related to Rural Development

A nation-wide plan in India to provide good all-weather road connectivity to unconnected villages. Of 178,000 (1.7 lakh) habitations with a population of above 500 in the plains and above 250 in the hilly areas planned to be connected by all-weather roads, 82% were already connected by December 2017 and work-in-progress on the remaining 47,000 habitations was on-track for completion by March 2019

Of 178,000 (1.7 lakh) habitations with a population of above 500 in the plains and above 250 in the hilly areas planned to be connected by all-weather roads, 82% were already connected by December 2017 and work-in-progress on the remaining 47,000 habitations was on-track for completion by March 2019

The primary objective of the Scheme is to provide additional and supplementary wage employment and thereby provide food security and improve nutritional levels in all rural areas. The secondary objective is the creation of durable community, social and economic assets and infrastructural development in rural areas.

pension scheme of the Government and contributes between Rs. 1000 and Rs. 12000/- per annum
I want to know about Swavalamban
can you tell me about Swavalamban
what is Swavalamban
responses: Swavalamban. Any citizen of India who is not part of any statutory pension scheme of the Government and contributes between Rs. 1000 and Rs. 12000/- per annum, could join the scheme. The Central Government shall contribute Rs. 1000 per annum to all such citizens.

intents.tag: Sukanya Samridhi Yojana (Girl Child Prosperity Scheme)
patterns: Sukanya Samridhi Yojana (Girl Child Prosperity Scheme)
The scheme primarily ensures equitable share to a girl child in resources and savings of a family.
Is there any schemes related to The scheme primarily ensures equitable share to a girl child in resources and savings of a family.

The scheme primarily ensures equitable share to a girl child in resources and savings of a family. Tenure of SSY is 21 years from the date of opening of the account or till the marriage of the girl after she attains the age of 18 years.

Jawaharlal Nehru National Urban Renewal Mission was renamed to Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation (AMRUT) and then relaunched by Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi in June 2015 with the focus to establish infrastructure that could ensure adequate robust sewage networks and water supply for urban transformation by implementing urban revival projects.

patterns: National Child Labour Projects(NCLP)
Child Labour
Is there any schemes related to Child Labour

The objective of this scheme is to eradicate child labor in hazardous industries by 2010. The children in the age group of 9-14 years are withdrawn from work and put into NCLP Special Training Centres, where they are provided with bridge education, vocational training, mid-day meal, stipend, health care etc. before being mainstreamed into formal education system.

responses: National Child Labour Projects(NCLP). The objective of this scheme is to eradicate child labor in hazardous industries by 2010. The children in the age group of 9-14 years are withdrawn from work and put into NCLP Special Training Centres, where they are provided with bridge education, vocational training, mid-day meal, stipend, health care etc. before being mainstreamed into formal education system.
